mapper.select: SELECT `type` as `type`, scope_type as scopeType , `threshold` as `threshold` , `reduce` as `reduce`, is_random_reduce as isRandomReduce, lowest_reduce as lowestReduce, `desc` AS `desc`, maximal_reduce as maximalReduce, scope_id AS scopeId FROM coupon_detail WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT t2.`type` AS `type`, t2.scope_type AS scopeType, t2.`threshold` AS `threshold`, t2.`reduce` AS `reduce`, t2.is_random_reduce as isRandomReduce, t2.lowest_reduce as lowestReduce, t2.`desc` AS `desc`, t2.maximal_reduce as maximalReduce FROM coupon t1, coupon_detail t2 WHERE t1.coupon_detail_id = t2.id AND t1.id = #{couponId}
